meta.name: Accessible Palette
meta.description: Colors with 4.5:1 contrast against their designated background (white or black), meeting WCAG AA standards. Neutral colors meet 4.5:1 against both.

onWhite.$description: Colors safe for text and icons on white backgrounds (4.5:1+ contrast)

onBlack.$description: Colors safe for text and icons on black backgrounds (4.5:1+ contrast)

neutral.$description: Colors safe in both white and black background contexts
